content: the wattle stitch washcloth is a great way to learn a new stitch while also making a beautiful and useful washcloth what s included * a 4 page printable pdf download * link to video stitch tutorial pattern difficulty easy yarn less than 1 skein of wecrochet dishie 100% cotton worsted #4 yarn due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
